ComicInfo.Title: The Dog of War Part 2
ComicInfo.Series: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Dog of War
ComicInfo.Summary: The Dog of War Part 2: As Quark and the crew of Deep space Nine grow more attached to Latinum the dog, Sisko experiments with trying to access and control the Borg technology that was found with the dog to see if it can be a useful tool in the war with the Dominion, but Sisko risks having the Borg technology control him instead.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 05:14:43. [CVDB987319] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:47:32. [Issue ID 2527020]
ComicInfo.Characters: Vic Fontaine (hologram),Quark's mystery contact,Latinum (a dog),Captain Benjamin Sisko,Dr. Julian Bashir,Constable Odo,Chief Miles O'Brien,Locutus of Borg [Captain Jean-Luc Picard] (flashback),Major Kira Nerys,Elim Garak,Lt. Commander Worf,Quark,the Borg (hologram),Lt. Commander Jadzia Dax,Admiral William Ross
ComicInfo.Teams: United Federation of Planets,Borg,Deep Space Nine Crew,Starfleet
